version_description:
> New elegant user-interface and design
> Ability to place an advance "On-the-Go" Order in select locations
> Various bug fixes

• Expanded menu (at participating On-the-Go Ordering locations)
• Ability to purchase or load a Dunkin' card using Visa Checkout
• Easier ability to add Offers/Rewards to an On-the-Go Order (at participating On-the-Go Ordering locations)
• Improved Store Locator functionality
• Additional Gift Card Designs
• Various other bug fixes and enhancements

> Ability to purchase or load a Dunkin’ Donuts card using Apple Pay
> Various bug fixes

Offer Disclaimer:
Buy a DD Card or Reload a DD Card with Apple Pay through the Dunkin Mobile® App only from 6/23/16 – 9/1/16 and receive 50 bonus points. Max 50 bonus points per week per user account.

•Various user enhancements, including
•improved flows for adding card value
•improved Perks enrollment flow
•menu enhancements
•map/location enhancements
•enhancements to Gifting
•"Favorite" Locations changed to "Recents"
•Various bug fixes

Offer Disclaimer:
Buy a DD Card or Reload a DD Card with Apple Pay through the Dunkin Mobile® App only from 6/23/16 – 9/1/16 and receive 50 bonus points. Max 50 bonus points per week per user account.

Based on user feedback, added "While Using the App" back as an option for Location Services

Offer Disclaimer:
Buy a DD Card or Reload a DD Card with Apple Pay through the Dunkin Mobile® App only from 6/23/16 – 9/1/16 and receive 50 bonus points. Max 50 bonus points per week per user account.

• Almond Milk now available using On-the-Go Ordering!
• Location Services no longer required for On-the-Go Ordering
• Various menu enhancements
• Map optimizations
• Various bug fixes

Introducing the most feature-packed Mobile App update in Dunkin' Donuts history.

• Accessibility improvements
Now works better with your device text readers!

• 3D Touch Quick Options (iPhone 6S and higher required)
We are all about speed and we’ve made it even faster to access the functionality of the app. From your phone's home screen, force touch the Dunkin Donuts app icon to reach in-app functionality even faster.

• Multiple Device Login
You asked for it, and we listened! You will now be able to log in with the same DD perks account across multiple devices.

• New Homescreen Layout
You’ll notice some of the tiles have changed locations, but don’t worry, your favorite features are still there!

• Various bug fixes and improvements based on your feedback
Including improved Log In, Enrollment, and DD Card Reload functionalities

***As a reminder, if you already have a DD Perks account, make sure you tap “Log In” when you open the app to log in to your account.***

Introducing the most feature-packed Mobile App update in Dunkin' Donuts history.

• Accessibility improvements
Now works better with your device text readers!

• iMessage mGifting (iOS 10+ and Apple Pay required)
Now sending DD Card mGifts is even easier. Install the Dunkin Donuts mGift feature from the iMessage App Store to text your family and friends a Dunkin Donuts mGift. (Dunkin Donuts Mobile app required for mGift recipient)

• 3D Touch Quick Options (iPhone 6S and higher required)
We are all about speed and we’ve made it even faster to access the functionality of the app. From your phone's home screen, force touch the Dunkin' Donuts app icon to reach in-app functionality even faster.

• Multiple Device Login
You asked for it, and we listened! You will now be able to log in with the same DD perks account across multiple devices.

• New Homescreen Layout
You’ll notice some of the tiles have changed locations, but don’t worry, your favorite features are still there!

• Various bug fixes and improvements based on your feedback
Including improved Log In, Enrollment, and DD Card Reload functionalities

***As a reminder, if you already have a DD Perks account, make sure you tap “Log In” when you open the app to log in to your account.***

· On-the-Go Transaction History
We read your reviews, and guess what? It’s here. Now you can see your Order History from the Settings menu of the app.
· On-the-Go Ordering Location selection improvements.
Order your favorite Dunkin' items, even easier. #WTFast
· Various bug fixes and improvements based on your feedback
Including improved login & enrollment, and some menu updates we know you’ll love!

***As a reminder, if you already have a DD Perks account, make sure you tap “Log In” when you open the app to login to your account.***

Introducing the New Dunkin' Emoji Keyboard
· Finally, the emojis you need to share your Dunkin' coffee and donut love are here! With hot & iced coffee, munchkin® classics and donut sayings, you can now speak in true Dunkin' language across your favorite platforms.

You can now customize your Favorite Order names!
· Save and name your favorites for an even faster run next time.

Tap “My Card” on the home screen to see your DD Cards balance.

Improved DD Perks layout
· Sometimes swiping through all of your offers can be tough; we’ve made it easier.

Various bug fixes and improvements based on your feedback
· Including improved login & enrollment, and some menu updates we know you’ll love!

***As a reminder, if you already have a DD Perks account, make sure you tap “Log In” when you open the app to login to your account.***

Now accepting Masterpass for DD Gift Card Purchases, Reloads, Auto Reload, and mGifting!

Payment Option Redesign
With so many options to choose from, we improved our layout for choosing your DD Card payment type.

Introducing Recent Payment Type
This will make your Dunkin' Run even faster, allowing you to add value to your DD Gift Card more quickly.

TouchID (On Available Devices)
Always forgetting your password? Now enable TouchID after login or from the settings menu.

Various bug fixes and improvements based on your feedback
Including improved maps, and some menu updates we know you’ll love!

**As a reminder, if you already have a DD Perks account, make sure you tap “Log In” when you open the app to login to your account.**

You asked for it, we listened. DD Card Balance Merge is here!
You can now transfer the balance from one DD Card to another. Select the DD Card you want to transfer balance from, scroll down and select “Merge Balance”.

Enrolling and managing your payment type for DD Perks is now easier than ever. Device Camera Card Scanner has arrived.
When adding a credit/debit card to your account, select the camera icon to scan your card number directly into the app.

Various bug fixes and improvements based on your feedback
Including improved location searching, easier navigation, and some menu updates we know you’ll love!

***As a reminder, if you already have a DD Perks account, make sure you tap “Log In” when you open the app to login to your account.***

Including improved location searching, easier navigation, and some menu updates we know you’ll love!

***As a reminder, if you already have a DD Perks account, make sure you tap “Log In” when you open the app to login to your account.***

Even faster On the Go Ordering!
The last location you placed an On the Go Order to will now be automatically selected.

Want to delete a location from your recent On the Go list? Now you can.
Just swipe on the location and tap “delete”.

Various bug fixes and improvements based on your feedback
Including improved location searching, easier navigation, and some menu updates we know you’ll love!

***As a reminder, if you already have a DD Perks account, make sure you tap “Log In” when you open the app to login to your account.***

Improved On-the-Go Ordering!
Including re-ordering directly from your Order History and improved On-the-Go store locator.

Need to add value to your DD Card?
Reload right from the On-the-Go checkout page when submitting your order.

Received a bunch of DD Cards for a special occasion?
Now you can merge up to 3 DD Cards at a time!

Introducing the Newly Redesigned Dunkin’ Mobile App

Our Mobile App just got even better, with a lighter design, easier navigation and updates our consumers have been asking us for. Check out the newly redesigned Dunkin’ Donuts Mobile App!

From first launching the Dunkin’ Donuts Mobile App in 2012, introducing our DD Perks® Rewards Program in 2014 and then adding On-the-Go Mobile Ordering in 2016, we are constantly innovating to make it easier than ever to run on Dunkin’. Just like all of our digital innovations, our latest Dunkin’ Donuts Mobile App was built with our consumers in mind.

We know our busy, On-The-Go guests want to grab their Dunkin’ run and go, so we simplified our home screen. Now, guests can order their favorites or pay for their order right when they open the app with just a touch of a button and no scrolling required.

We’ve also heard from our guests that they want greater ability to customize their Mobile Orders, just like they would in-store. That’s why we’ve enhanced our On-the-Go menu, allowing guests to choose how much ice they’d like in their iced beverages, options for half decaf coffee and more.

Our DDPerks Rewards page also got a refresh, making it easier than ever for DDPerks Members to check how many points they’ve earned towards a free beverage and redeem their rewards. With DDPerks, guests earn five points for every dollar they spend at Dunkin’ Donuts when they pay using an enrolled DD Card. Once a member accrues 200 points, the guest receives a coupon for a free beverage of their choice right on the Dunkin’ Donuts Mobile App. Learn more at DDPerks.com.

The newly redesigned Dunkin’ Mobile App also allows guests to find Dunkin’ Donuts locations, send Gift Cards, find nutritional info and more. If you haven’t already, be sure to download the Dunkin’ Donuts Mobile App and enroll in DD Perks today.

How do you like our new, lighter Dunkin’ Mobile App? Let us know on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram!

To stay up to date on all things Dunkin', sign up for our email news alerts at news.dunkindonuts.com/alerts.

In a continued effort to enhance our DD Mobile App, we have updated our “Scan & Pay” QR screen. This now gives you a quicker way to view card balance and add value!

We have updated more of our On-The-Go experience such as adding:

• Recent Order on the Home Screen
• "Check-In Method” to your the Order History
• Up to 2 Swirls in beverages

Our emoji keyboard has moved to its own app that can be found on the App Store, just search for Dunkin' Donuts Emojis.

This update includes some bug fixes based on your feedback.

Be sure to check out some of the latest enhancements including:
• Recent Order on the Home Screen
• View balance on the "Scan & Pay" QR screen
• Up to 2 Swirls in beverages

On-The-Go Mobile Ordering New Look!

We are launching a new look and feel and simplifying how to use our On-The-Go Mobile Ordering. Some of the new enhancements include:

· New look and feel involving a lighter color pallet and easy to use buttons
· Select how you’re picking up your order when you choose a location
· Checkout with confidence with all the essentials on the screen like changing location, editing your order, or updating your payment

It's now easier to join the DD Perks program, so come on in and look around! Begin earning points when you purchase or add a Dunkin' Gift Card to your account.

This update also includes bug fixes as part of a continued effort to improve your experience.

This update includes bug fixes and enhancements as part of a continued effort to improve your app experience! Here are some updates you’ll find in the latest release:

• Ability to save your preferred locations to order from as a favorite. Favorite locations will display at the top of the store list when selecting a restaurant
• New points meter on the home screen for DDPerks members to track their progress towards redeeming their next free beverage!
• New & improved menu display pages
• This update includes bug fixes as part of a continued effort to improve your experience.

We’ve made some changes to enhance your app & ordering experience:

• On-the-Go ordering is now available for ALL app users using our Guest Ordering feature, while DD Perks® members can still log in to order and earn points when using On-The-Go. Order ahead, skip the wait, and get on with your day!

• Improvements to our app design, including a new & improved Offers page that makes it easier for logged in DD Perks members to track their Free Beverage Rewards, Bonus Point offers, and other great deals available

• We’ve fixed some kinks in our map when searching for locations

• Various other bug fixes & improvements

We’ve made some changes to enhance your app & ordering experience:

• On-the-Go ordering is now available for ALL app users using our Guest Ordering feature, while DD Perks® members can still log in to order and earn points when using On-The-Go. Order ahead, skip the wait, and get on with your day!
• Improvements to our app design, including a new & improved Offers page that makes it easier for logged in DD Perks members to track their Free Beverage Rewards, Bonus Point offers, and other great deals available
• We’ve fixed some kinks in our map when searching for locations
• Various other bug fixes & improvements
We’ve fixed some bugs and made some adjustments to improve your ordering experience. Order ahead, skip the wait and get on with your day with On-the-Go Ordering, now available for ALL app users.
We’ve fixed some bugs and made some adjustments to improve your ordering experience. Order ahead, skip the wait and get on with your day with On-the-Go Ordering, now available for ALL app users.
This update includes bug fixes as part of a continued effort to improve your experience.

• We’re speeding things up and making it easier to order! You no longer need to tell us when you’re ready to pick up your order. It will be sent to the store when you place it at checkout.
• Ordering ahead as a Guest? You can now use a DD Card for payment in addition to credit & debit.
• We’ve updated the design of the Main Menu. DD Perks members can manage their DD Cards & payment methods from the ‘Manage Funds’ section and App Settings can be found in ‘My Account’.

We’ve also fixed some bugs!
This update includes bug fixes as part of a continued effort to improve your experience.
This update includes bug fixes as part of a continued effort to improve your experience.

Ordering ahead through the Dunkin’ app allows guests a contactless way to order & pay. In this latest update, we’ve made some changes to enhance your app experience:

• Apple Pay is now a payment option when ordering on-the-go. Both DD Perks members & Guest users can find Apple Pay under ‘Other Payment Options’ on the Checkout screen
• Guest users now have the ability to apply coupons (when available) to their order. Check out the DD Perks & Offers page for upcoming coupons!
• Improvements to display accurate discounts and DD Card balances on the Checkout screen when ordering ahead
• Several other user experience improvements and bug fixes

The safety of our crew & our guests is our top priority. You can read more on what we’re doing to help keep you running safely on www.dunkindonuts.com
We’ve got your back, America!

Ordering ahead through the Dunkin’ app allows guests a contactless way to order & pay. Curbside pick-up is also now being added to many stores. In this update, we’ve added a NEW Curbside pick-up ordering flow for you to select your vehicle type & color in order to help our crew find you right away. Select ‘I’m Here’ once you’ve arrived and our crew will start your order & bring it to you! No car? No worries! Simply select ‘I don’t have a vehicle’ and our crew will bring your order to the store entrance.


Looking to order from a Dunkin’ with Curbside pick-up? Tap ‘Order’ to select a Dunkin’ location and filter by ‘Curbside’ at the top of the screen.

We’ve also made several other updates and bug fixes to improve your experience.

The safety of our crew & our guests is our top priority. You can read more on what we’re doing to help keep you running safely on www.dunkindonuts.com.
We’ve got your back, America.

Ordering ahead through the Dunkin’ app allows guests a contactless way to order & pay. We are always reviewing your feedback to learn how to improve your experience.
Our latest update includes the following:
• DD Perks members can easily re-order their recent mobile orders from the top of the home screen in just a few clicks. Tap ‘Order Now’ on your recent order, select a Dunkin’ location & pick-up method and submit your order!
• You can now easily apply available coupons, redeem free beverage rewards and view other discounts right from the Checkout page before placing your mobile order, under our new ‘Available Discounts’ section. Join DD Perks today for free beverages, special offers and more!
• We’ve also made several other updates and bug fixes to improve your experience.

Looking for a contactless way for us to bring your favorites out to you? Try Curbside Pickup in the app today! Tap the ‘I’m Here’ button in the app and our crew will start your mobile order and bring it out to you.

The safety of our crew & our guests is our top priority. You can read more on what we’re doing to help keep you running safely on www.dunkindonuts.com.

We’ve got your back, America.

DD Perks members - keep an eye out over the next few weeks for a new & improved ‘Manage Payments’ section, featuring a 1-step merge funds process, streamlined flows for auto-reload & additional DD cards, and an overall enhanced design.

Looking for a contactless way for us to bring your favorites out to you? Try Curbside Pickup in the app today! Tap the ‘I’m Here’ button in the app and our crew will start your mobile order and bring it out to you.

Join DD Perks® and earn points towards a free beverage reward! Members earn 5 points on every dollar spent, no matter how they pay, including: cash (in-store), credit, debit, an enrolled Dunkin’ gift card and Apple Pay.

DD Perks members – got a promo code from a Dunkin’ event or promotion? You can now add it to your account in the app on the DD Perks & Offers page.

We’re always looking to improve, so we’d love to hear from you! Leave us feedback under ‘Provide Feedback’ in the ‘Get Help’ section of the app.

Help everyone stay safe. Masks are required for both guests and crew inside our restaurants. Practice social distancing and use the Dunkin’ App for a contactless way to order and pay.

We’ve made several updates & bug fixes in this release to improve your app experience!

Did you know Dunkin’ Delivers? You can now use the app to find which partner delivers Dunkin’ in your area. Order on Grubhub, Uber Eats or DoorDash and get your Dunkin’ faves delivered directly to your doorstep!

Looking for an extra boost heading into 2021? Our NEW Extra Charged Coffee packs 20% more caffeine than our classic Hot & Iced Coffee, while delivering the same great taste. We’ve also launched two bold and exciting new hot coffees, Dunkin’ Midnight and Explorer Batch. Find these new brews in ‘Hot Drinks’ and order ahead on the app today!

We’re always looking to improve, so we’d love to hear from you! Leave us feedback under ‘Provide Feedback’ in the ‘Get Help’ section of the app. Love the Dunkin’ app? Rate us in the app store!

Help everyone stay safe. Masks are required for both guests and crew inside our restaurants. Practice social distancing and use the Dunkin’ App for a contactless way to order and pay.
